      • toKeyValuePairs

        public static Map<String,String> toKeyValuePairs(String httpString,
                                                 boolean performUrlDecode)
        Convert HTTP request string into key-value pairs
        Parameters:
        httpString - the query part of the http request url
        performUrlDecode - whether to URL-decode the keys and values
        Returns:
        null if httpString == null or httpString.length == 0
